content: colors * the pattern is easily adjustable the lace body is a multiple of 18 + 1 stitches adjust the number of co stitches for a wider or narrower item add or subtract repeats to adjust the length * the beads are optional and can be omitted you can also choose to reduce the number of beaded row per section if you desire * there is a five-stitch garter stitch border on the sides * placing additional stitch markers between the repeats will make counting easier just slip the markers as you come to them * **if you do not wish to add beads to your work work the k2tog+b stitch as a k2tog only ** *designed by pam meek* you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything please allow a few minutes for the download link to be emailed to you if the email doesn t arrive within a few minutes just log into your account on our site and you ll see your completed orders from there you ll find the download link enjoy your knitting chandi new read about our pattern download process here 7 * dost thou love life then do not squander time for that is the stuff life is made of benjamin franklin* 1 https //www expressionfiberarts com/ 2 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/ 3 https //www expressionfiberarts com/categories/sport html 4 https //www expressionfiberarts com/categories/sport/luster-sport html 5 https //www expressionfiberarts com/categories/sport/luster-sport html 6 https //blog expressionfiberarts com/2025/02/14/knit-this-colorful-beaded-shlanket-today-horology/ 7 https //www expressionfiberarts com/faqs/
